verses.verse: <S%H7891>Sing<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7892>song;<s%> <S%H7891>Sing<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

<S%H7891>Sing<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> His <S%H8034>name;<s%> <S%H1319>Proclaim<s%> good <S%H1319>tidings<s%> of His <S%H3444>salvation<s%> from <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H3117>day.<s%>
<S%H5608>Tell<s%> of His <S%H9202>glory<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> His <S%H6381>wonderful<s%> <S%H6381>deeds<s%> among <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples.<s%>
For <S%H1419>great<s%> is the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H3966>greatly<s%> to be <S%H1984>praised;<s%> He is to be <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H430>gods.<s%>
For <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> are <S%H457>idols,<s%> But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens.<s%>
<S%H1935>Splendor<s%> and <S%H1926>majesty<s%> are <S%H6923>before<s%> Him, <S%H5797>Strength<s%> and <S%H8597>beauty<s%> are in His <S%H4720>sanctuary.<s%>
<S%H3051>Ascribe<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> O <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> <S%H3051>Ascribe<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H9202>glory<s%> and <S%H5797>strength.<s%>
<S%H3051>Ascribe<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of His <S%H8034>name;<s%> <S%H5375>Bring<s%> an <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and <S%H935>come<s%> into His <S%H2691>courts.<s%>

<S%H559>Say<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> "The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H4427>reigns;<s%> <S%H637>Indeed,<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> is <S%H3559>firmly<s%> <S%H3559>established,<s%> it will not be <S%H4131>moved;<s%> He will <S%H1777>judge<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> with <S%H4339>equity.<s%>"
Let the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> be <S%H8055>glad,<s%> and let the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1523>rejoice;<s%> Let the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H7481>roar,<s%> and <S%H4393>all<s%> it <S%H4393>contains;<s%>

Let the <S%H9583>field<s%> <S%H5937>exult,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that is in it. <S%H227>Then<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H9194>forest<s%> will <S%H7442>sing<s%> for <S%H7442>joy<s%>

<S%H6440>Before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> for He is <S%H935>coming;<s%> For He is <S%H935>coming<s%> to <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%> He will <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> in <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> And the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> in His <S%H530>faithfulness.<s%>
